# ğŸ“¦ 4. Install Required R Packages

Run RStudio **as Administrator**.

```r
install.packages(c(
  "shiny",
  "shinydashboard",
  "shinyFiles",
  "shinyalert",
  "shinyjs",
  "DT",
  "magick",
  "grid",
  "reticulate",
  "tesseract",
  "leaflet",
  "raster",
  "sf",
  "jsonlite",
  "stringr",
  "dplyr",
  "tidyr",
  "remotes"
))
```

Optional Dropbox support:
```r
remotes::install_github("karthik/rdrop2")
```

---

# ğŸ 5. Install Python Packages

Open **CMD (not admin)**.

Check Python:
```

```

Install Python modules:
```
pip install opencv-python pillow pandas GDAL imutils rasterio geopandas numpy pytesseract shapely fiona
```
